title: Norakuro
synopsis: Norakuro is a black dog enlisted in the "Mokenrentai" (Fierce Dog Brigade), an Imperial army of dogs fighting in a war against the enemy Monkey Army.
related_anime: ['Norakuro Gochou', 'Norakuro Ittouhei', 'Norakuro Shoui: Nichiyoubi no Kaijiken', 'Norakuro-kun', 'Norakuro Compilation OVA', 'Norakuro']
